title: [Large-Scale] Analysis of Attitudinal Learning Effects of Case-Based Learning (CBL) in Online Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and experience, domain knowledge in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, learners utilize personal devices (tablets/laptops) for case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more attitudinal change factors by analyzing CBL (Challenge-Based Learning) application cases
Learners can evaluate the impact of CBL on their ID (Instructional Design) professional development through self-reflection reports
Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of CBL and propose instructional design strategies applicable to their own professional field
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
